newsitem.title: QATAR: Qatar foreign minister to visit Bahrain.
newsitem.headline: Qatar foreign minister to visit Bahrain.

text.p: Qatar's foreign minister Sheikh Hamad bin Jassim bin Jabr al-Thani will visit Bahrain on Sunday in an attempt to ease strained relations between the two Gulf Arab states, a Qatari official said on Saturday.
"The visit comes within the context of efforts to clear the atmosphere and promote existing relations between the two brotherly states," said the official at the ministry of foreign affairs.
Qatar and Bahrain are locked in a territorial dispute centred on small but potentially rich Gulf islands controlled by Bahrain since the 1930s but also claimed by Qatar.
Gulf Arab reconciliation efforts have failed to ease tensions between Manama and Doha.
